channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge sides with Meta in antitrust trial, will not spin off WhatsApp and Instagram
item.description: A federal judge ruled against the Federal Trade Commission's antitrust suit alleging that Meta had stifled competition by buying up its rivals.

item.title: Toyota keeps betting on hybrid vehicles in the US
item.description: The investment follows an announcement last week that Toyota will spend up to $10 billion over the next five years in the United States.

item.title: Meta wins antitrust trial as judge denies that it’s a monopoly
item.description: A federal judge ruled that Meta is not a monopoly in a lawsuit with the FTC.
